attributes.action: ban the sale and use of hydrogenated or "trans" fats in the UK and require all food service areas to provide nutritional info and ingredients.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hydrogenated or "trans" fats can increase the risk of heart disease; which costs the nhs more money, banning the sale and use of such fats will reduce heart disease and nhs costs.
